abstract: Danko Lazović (Serbian Cyrillic: Данко Лазовић, born 17 May 1983) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Serbian SuperLiga club FK Partizan as a forward or a winger. Lazović represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Danko Lazović (Serbian Cyrillic: Данко Лазовић, born 17 May 1983) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Serbian SuperLiga club FK Partizan as a forward or a winger. Lazović represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
